name: Hold Fey
book: Pathfinder Campaign Setting: The First World, Realm of the Fey © 2016, Paizo Inc.
components: V, S, F/DF (a small, straight piece of iron)
text: This spell functions as per hold person, except it affects a fey instead of a humanoid.
components_zh: 语言、姿势、器材/法器(一小条笔直的铁片)
text_zh: 此法术效果如同人类定身术(hold person)，除了只影响精类而非类人外。
